name: Snake VS Bomb [Commodore 64]
description:
TND Games is very proud to present to you an entry for the Snake Fun Compo on CSDB. Snake VS Bomb is a fun for five minutes hi score challenge that features the following:

  • 8 Levels of increasing speed 
  • Addictive gameplay
  • Loading bitmap
  • Front end presentation
  • Hi score table
  • Arcade style sound effects and cool music
  • Plus much more.
  • PAL/NTSC compatible
  • Compatible with theC64 mini, theC64, full size and theVIC20

Instructions

This is a fun hi score attack challenge, featuring 8 levels of madcap mayhem. You are a snake, which is travelling through a very long tunnel. During your travels you encounter fruit and bombs, which are placed at random inside the tunnel. The snake can eat the fruit if the fruit reaches its head for points. However, the bombs must be avoided. If any part of the snake collides into a bomb (or vice-versa), the bomb will explode along with the snake. The game will then be over.

Completing a level

Between the score panel and below it is a timer bar. This will drain per interval. This indicates how far or near you are to the next level. After the bar runs out fully, you will move onto the next level, which will get faster. For each level completed, a bonus of 1,000 points will be awarded.

There are 8 levels in total - if you can survive for that long that is!

Controls

Use Joystick in port 2 only (If playing online, use Cursor Keys as direction and Z as the firebutton).
